creator: thoth@incanta.net
text:
We're trying to trick a servlet into servicing all requests into a web space,
but then the automatic un-warring doesn't work.

In our webapps/warehouse/WEB-INF/web.xml we have

        <servlet-mapping>
                <servlet-name>GetCommand</servlet-name>
                <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
        </servlet-mapping>

In our conf/server.xml we have

        <Context path="" docBase="warehouse" debug="0" />

Which means that every URL that doesn't map to another servlet will be served by
the GetCommand servlet.

However tomcat bails on start-up with an error if the webapps/warehouse
directory does not exist.

If we create the directory, then tomcat will not automatically un-war
warehouse.war.

Can anyone provide a workaround?

creator: remm@apache.org
text: Specifying warehouse.war as the doc base should work.
